channel.title: Help with delta
channel.description:
hey guys, i have a delta source and i have a problem. when i log out there is a delay between client and server, so if i try to log back in straight away it blocks my ip because it thinks im flooding the server. how can i fix this?
Ive checked the login method but cant seem to find anything strange...
thanks.

item.title: Help with delta
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ChaosTheory2013, post:1, topic:518001”]hey guys, i have a delta source and i have a problem.
when i log out there is a delay between client and server, so if i try to log back in straight away it blocks my ip because it thinks im flooding the server. how can i fix this?

Ive checked the login method but cant seem to find anything strange…

thanks.[/quote]
You can do what strucker said:

Strucker:

Run in eclipse, and post the lines from the print when you are “flooding”

Or you can go to client.java and search “Banning Host”

@Dagger, stay on your topic please, unless you had the answer.

Read full topic
